001package com.commercetools.graphql.api.types;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonSubTypes;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonTypeInfo;
005import java.lang.String;
006import java.util.List;
007
008@JsonTypeInfo(
009    use = JsonTypeInfo.Id.NAME,
010    include = JsonTypeInfo.As.PROPERTY,
011    property = "__typename"
012)
013@JsonSubTypes({
014    @JsonSubTypes.Type(value = ProductVariantSelectionIncludeAllExcept.class, name = "ProductVariantSelectionIncludeAllExcept"),
015    @JsonSubTypes.Type(value = ProductVariantSelectionIncludeOnly.class, name = "ProductVariantSelectionIncludeOnly")
016})
017public interface ProductVariantSelection {
018  String getType();
019
020  void setType(String type);
021
022  List<String> getSkus();
023
024  void setSkus(List<String> skus);
025}
